lead_paragraph: Yamaha's one of those fun Japanese conglomerates that makes things as diverse as baby grand pianos and motorcycles. But music and audio is where the company had its start (its logo is three tuning forks arranged in a circle), and those remain a core competency.
snippet: Yamaha's latest iPod/Phone dock cuts out certain jarring frequencies when its clock-radio feature attempts to rouse you out of bed.

headline.main: A Gentle Wake-Up Call from Yamaha

abstract: Yamaha's latest iPod/Phone dock cuts out certain jarring frequencies when its clock-radio feature attempts to rouse you out of bed.
